column4: can anyone help with the usb hdd issue? Also, I would like to know of any apps for mp3 playback. Did not like amarok, xmms, juk or rhythmbox
i will try it... I am a musicmatch user from windoze days, and I would like to have something like that...
why did you not like those ones? mplayer is mostly a command line thingie
i think mplayer would not be your friend then
